newsitem.title: POLAND: Universal ready for share buyback.
newsitem.headline: Universal ready for share buyback.

text.p: Polish trading firm Universal SA is ready to begin its share buyback, on which it plans to spend 11.5 million zlotys, the firm said in a statement on Friday.
The company earlier said it wanted to buy the shares to retire them. The buyback operation on the bourse could last until the end of the year, it said.
